stories.title: ‘Massive wake-up call’: Crypto faces growing legal crackdown
Counterfeit Covid Vaccine Card Market Takes Hold in the U.S. and Europe

stories.text:
We are a low code/no Code platform for building internal tools. Ironically we do educate customers at times that NoCode is like lego block approach of building software with pre-built blocks.

You think we should be concerned about our logo being used by Lego. If it should be concerning then what options you think we have?

References Our logo: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/05/DronaHQ_Logo.png

Lego Dot: https://www.auchan.ro/public/images/hfd/hec/h00/lego-dots-rame-foto-creative-9004968247326.jpg
